item.description:
Let's go check out Tattersall Farm Day.

What you need to know about this event:

  • They will have Food, beverages, Pony Rides, Winemaking Geology, Hay Rides, Petting Zoo (yippee) and many many more things for us to do and see. 
  • Cost: Adults: $5.00  Children 16 and under free.  So bring the kids and join us at this event.
  • All proceeds to benefit the farm, which is a 150 acre Haverhill property dedicated to agricultural history and preservation as well as passive recreation.
  • Featuring Live music by the White Street band.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  We thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.


We look forward to seeing you at the farm!

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meetup at the gate where you get your ticket if you can't find us call the meetup cell 978-304-2811.
item.name: Tattersall Farm Day
